ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] Bards abilities redefined was: Attack speedups
ygData.msgSnippet: ... I ll see your FBSS and yaks and raise you a HQ Bear Skin that overcrowding would beat downtime.  And less people per server would help all classes. Just
ygData.messageBody:
Rokenn wrote:

> No one, and I mean no one, is better at down time reduction
> then we are. Ask
> any player in, on any server, what they hate the most about
> the game and I
> would bet a FBSS and a pair of yaks that downtime would be at
> the top of the
> list.

I'll see your FBSS and yaks and raise you a HQ Bear Skin that overcrowding
would beat downtime. And less people per server would help all classes.
Just about anyone would be welcome in a group were the ratio of mobs/players
better.

Peace
Evulia, bard of 10 verses, Tunare
